featured.title: Creating Websites That Stand Out
featured.subtitle: Modern, responsive, and tailored to your needs

movement.title: Recovery through Movement
movement.description: Movement is a crucial part of health. Targeted and controlled movement accelerates the healing process and helps relieve pain. Together, we work on an exercise program that fits your situation and goals. The ultimate goal is to become stronger and more resilient, improve performance, and prevent complaints/injuries in the future.

evidence.title: Evidence Based Practice
evidence.description: We believe it's important that you receive a safe, effective, and up-to-date approach to your health problem. Our treatments are based on the most current and reliable scientific knowledge. This is tailored to what's important to you and what works in practice.

communication.title: Communication
communication.description: In our practice, communication is central. We find it important to talk openly and clearly with you about your complaints, goals, and expectations. Additionally, we maintain contact, if necessary, with your treating physician or other healthcare providers. This ensures everyone is aware of your progress and that your care is well-coordinated.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Our practice's strength lies in musculoskeletal rehabilitation. This includes all complaints that can be linked to our locomotor system.

description: FysioForce is a kine practice that stands for a personalised approach to your health issues with a focus on movement.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

appointment.question: How does the first appointment go?
appointment.answer: We start with a good conversation, the anamnesis, to get to know the story behind your complaints. This is followed by an extensive physical examination to get an overall picture of your health complaints. With all this information, a personal treatment plan is drawn up, taking your expectations into account.

bring.question: What should I bring?
bring.answer:
- Prescription from attending physician
- Identity card or valid passport
- Adhesive note from the health insurance company
- Any recent imaging, (operation) reports, etc.
- Comfortable clothes
- Work accident insurance details (if work accident)

cost.question: How much does treatment cost?
cost.answer: You can find our rates here.

conventional.title: Conventional
conventional.description: We are conventioned. This means we follow the official rates set by RIZIV.

insurance.title: Reimbursement
insurance.description: Reimbursement varies depending on your health insurance. With a doctor's prescription, you receive partial reimbursement from RIZIV.
